How to unlock Elemental Adept

You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Elemental Adept

All Classes at Level 4

Elemental Adept Tips & Notes

Allows you to bypass resistance on an enemy when using a specific damage type. There are a couple of subclasses in this game that are specific to damage types, like Light Clerics are very fire-oriented and Storm Sorcerers are very Thunder-oriented. Note
